name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 21, around 8:30 p.m., a liquefied gas tank exploded at Fuyang BBQ Restaurant in Xingqing District, Yinchuan, Ningxia. There were injuries at the scene, but the authorities have not yet released the number of casualties.
A reporter who heard the news and rushed to the scene was broadcasting live, but was discovered and cut off by relevant department personnel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The circle of friends posted by the reporter whose live broadcast was cut off.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
"On the day when the mining accident announced that 53 people had died, the second most popular video I searched on B station was a tutorial on how to use fake words to answer the public relations crisis of Alashan in a civil servant interview"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
I saw some unemployed middle-aged people on 58.com

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xinhua News Agency reported that the explosion caused 31 deaths

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up
Hebei University of Technology issued a report on the situation
claiming that the statement that "the teacher cheated and forced the student to death" was untrue.
The student took leave twice due to physical discomfort during the graduation project and was absent from the centralized Q&A session. He gave up submitting the graduation project on June 1st, and there was no problem of "the teacher handed over the graduation project to others"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Take some money from the security fund and pay for a psychiatrist.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Breaking news!
Just now, at Peking University, a woman held up a sign at the entrance of the Home Canteen:
"Abolish one-party totalitarianism and embrace a multi-party system"
She was then immediately taken away by the security department.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In the early morning of November 27 last year, someone wrote a poem at the same location, which triggered a rally by Peking University students that evening.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Supplemental correction
According to the Twitter and YouTube information on the sign, the protester should be a man named "Zhang Sheng". His note is a "Chinese writer".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Correction: According to the Twitter and YouTube information on the sign, the protester should be a man named "Zhang Sheng". His note is a "Chinese writer".
